mapper.sql: id, data_source_name, jdbc_url, username, `password`, remark, type_id, alive_flag, purpose, `host`, port
mapper.insert: insert into waterfall_data_source (data_source_name, jdbc_url, username, `password`, remark, type_id, alive_flag, purpose, `host`, port) values (#{dataSourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jdbcUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aliveFlag,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{purpose,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into waterfall_data_source
data_source_name,
jdbc_url,
username,
`password`,
remark,
type_id,
alive_flag,
purpose,
`host`,
port,
database,
#{dataSourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{jdbcUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update waterfall_data_source
data_source_name = #{dataSourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jdbc_url = #{jdbcUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
alive_flag = #{aliveFlag,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
purpose = #{purpose,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`host` = #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
port = #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
database = #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update waterfall_data_source set data_source_name = #{dataSourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jdbc_url = #{jdbcUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, alive_flag = #{aliveFlag,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, purpose = #{purpose,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `host` = #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, port = #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.data_source_type_name AS dataSourceTypeName, t2.id AS id, t2.data_source_name AS dataSourceName, t2.jdbc_url AS jdbcUrl, t2.username AS username, t2.password AS password, t2.remark AS remark, t2.type_id AS typeId, t2.alive_flag AS aliveFlag, t2.purpose AS purpose, t2.host AS host, t2.port AS port FROM waterfall_data_source_type t1,waterfall_data_source t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.type_id AND t2.purpose = #{purpose}
